00016     public class Field
00017     {
00018         public int BorderWidth { get; set; }
00019 
00020         public List<Player> Players { get; set; }
00021         public Ball Ball { get; set; }
00022 
00023         public Size Size { get; private set; }
00024 
00025         public int Width { get { return Size.Width; } }
00026         public int Height { get { return Size.Height; } }
00027 
00028         public Field(int width, int height)
00029         {
00030             Size = new Size(width, height);
00031             
00032             Players = new List<Player>();
00033             Ball = new Ball(new Point(width / 2, height / 2));
00034             
00035             BorderWidth = 5;
00036         }
00037 
00038         public Bitmap ToBitmap()
00039         {
00040             var outputSize = Size + new Size(2 * BorderWidth, 2 * BorderWidth);
00041             var output = new Bitmap(outputSize.Width, outputSize.Height);
00042 
00043             using (var graph = Graphics.FromImage(output))
00044             {
00045                 graph.Clear(Color.Black);
00046                 graph.DrawRectangle(new Pen(Color.Blue, BorderWidth), BorderWidth / 2, BorderWidth / 2, Width + BorderWidth, Height + BorderWidth);
00047 
00048                 foreach (var p in Players)
00049                     p.DrawToField(graph);
00050                 Ball.DrawToField(graph);
00051             }
00052 
00053             return output;
00054         }
00055 
00056         
00057     }
